reviews.review: 我希望官方管管外挂好吗？这真的很影响游戏体验
咕咕咕咕咕咕过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过过

Where do I start?

If I am level 1 on a different killer, I get matched with survivors that are "on par" with my rank. So when I am trying to level a level 1 killer, or learn a killer, I am forced to face the same caliber of survivor as I would on my highest level, most successful killer. Do you realize how moronic that sounds. How demoralizing that can be? Dont worry, pretty soon noone will want to play a killer, and then you wont have a game, and people who know and abuse survivors strength with the current state of the game will no longer be able to stroke their small weens. Bc you have no idea how to balance a game. You dont.

The killer is supposed to be respected, feared, in this situation, by means of killing potential, no? Then why are there constantly lobbies with 4 flashlights, bodyblocking, dead hard, DS, etc. All 4 people get to have the same capabilities? Gens take 6 mins to fully complete if you dont have any gen defense, which is laughable to even call it that. You need to restructure this gameplay so that it is more in the killers favor, the survivors have something to lose, but something greater to gain..all-the-while at the  same time they know not to mess with the killer.  ... If a survivor attempts to remove an individual from a hook and you melee them, that should be grounds for an auto-down (provided you have been outside of 5m of the hook within the last 3 seconds etc..).. not 1st stage... there needs to be consequences. Especially when the person with borrowed time is blocking after unhook. It is moronic and that would never happen if things were balanced.  If you dont make changes you are going to kill this game. Which is ironic.
El juego es muy divertido para jugar con amigos y solo se los recomiendo al 100%
boring ass mf game. Take a shower if u play this game.

Game is sometimes on or off with the fun of it, other times as killer you may snowball and get 3/4 kills and other games you may get none at all.

Survivor can be really hit or miss as well, sometimes you all get out or you get to loop the killer.. and other times you may just get camped in the basement and have no way out because you didn't bring any of the META perks (Decisive strike, dead hard, unbreakable, borrowed time, etc...)

At least a decent time killer, though then again I think most of the time I would rather be playing something different if I had the choice..

Could be better, though it is more of a.. "one of its kind" type of game, there isn't really much alternatives when it comes to this specific genre of cat and mouse type of chasing and game play for the most part.

I will also say that if you want to unlock most of the other perks and killers in the game.. you either need to pay up quite a good bit of cash or grind all what's left of your soul left after playing this game..
One of my favorite games to play with friends.
制作组搞杀手玩家心态有一手的

Um jogo que só é realmente divertido se jogar com amigos pois jogar de Killer as vezes te dá vontade de cometer suicidio por causa das pessoas que jogam com os amigos. Fora isso as premiações são bem legais, a dinâmica e mecânica de cada killer é divertido de se explorar e se torna divertido se os suvirvors não estão sendo tóxicos. <3
its a very adrenaline rushing game and in general a great game.
